participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message:
Hey team :wave:  looking for some assistance on a question from bank of america on the Run Metaflow API:
```How can we pass our batch/document meta data while calling Run Metaflow API (might be bullet # 1 above) and how can we maintain this data or refer this meta data throughout the lifecycle of the flow run?```

@georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire would like to understand what the use case is.  If it is adding additional metadata as part of the Run Flow API, then having them set the runtime_config in the API should suffice.
